\pard\ltrpar\keepn\nowidctlpar\s1\qj\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928 By Council Members Salamanca and Adams\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\b0\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the Department of Transportation, the Department of Environmental Protection, and the Department of Citywide Administrative Services, filed an application pursuant to Section 197-c of the New York City Charter for the acquisition of property located at:\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-720\li720\qj\tx720\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-540\li720\qj\tx720 1.\tab The northeast corner of Montgomery Street and the FDR Drive, on the block bounded by Water Street, Gouverneur Slip, the FDR Drive, and Montgomery Street (Block 244, p/o Lot 19), Manhattan Community District 3;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-540\li720\qj\tx720\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-540\li720\qj\tx720 2.\tab Approximately the center of the block bound by Delancey Street, the FDR Drive, Grand Street, and Lewis Street (Block 321, p/o Lot 1), Manhattan Community District 3;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-540\li720\qj\tx720\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-540\li720\qj\tx720 3.\tab The southeast corner of Columbia and East Houston Streets, on the block bound by East Houston Street, the FDR Drive, Delancey Street, and Columbia Street (Block 323, p/o Lot 1), Manhattan Community District 3; \par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-540\li720\qj\tx720\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-540\li720\qj\tx720 4.\tab The west side of the FDR Drive between East 14\super th\nosupersub  and East 10\super th\nosupersub  Streets (Block 367, p/o Lot 1), Manhattan Community District 3; \par
\par
5.\tab The west side of the FDR Drive between East 15\super th\nosupersub  and East 14\super th\nosupersub  Streets (Block 988, p/o Lot 1), Manhattan Community District 6;\par
\par
6.\tab The west side of the FDR Drive between Avenue C and the FDR Drive (Block 990, p/o Lot 1), Manhattan Community District 6;\par
\par
7.\tab The southwest corner East 25\super th\nosupersub  Street and Asser Levy Place, on the block bound East 25\super th\nosupersub  Street, Asser Levy Place, East 23\super rd\nosupersub  Street, and First Avenue, (Block 995, p/o Lot 5), Manhattan Community District 6; and\par
\pard\ltrpar\li720\fs20\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-540\li720\qj\tx720\fs24 8.\tab Part of the east side of the FDR Drive Right of Way between Avenue C and East 15\super th\nosupersub  Street, Manhattan Community District 6; for a flood protection system.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-720\li720\qj\tx720\par
\pard\box\brdrdash\brdrw150\brdrcf2\brsp300\brdrsh \ltrpar\qj\cf1 which in conjunction with the related action would facilitate the development of the East Side Coastal Resiliency (\ldblquote ESCR\rdblquote ) project, a comprehensive flood protection system along the East River in Manhattan Community Districts 3 and 6 (ULURP No. C 190357 PQM), (the \ldblquote Application\rdblquote );\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\cf0\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\tx720 WHEREAS, the City Planning Commission filed with the Council on September 24, 2019, its decision dated September 23, 2019 (the \ldblquote Decision\rdblquote ) on the Application;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\tx720 WHEREAS, the Application is related to application N 190356 ZRM (L.U. No. 549), a text amendment to Article VI, Chapter 2 (Special Regulations Applying in the Waterfront Area) to satisfy the requirements of Zoning Resolution (\ldblquote ZR\rdblquote ) Section 62-50 and Section 62-60.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\tx720 WHEREAS, the Decision is subject to review and action by the Council pursuant to Section 197-d of the City Charter;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\tx720 WHEREAS, upon due notice, the Council held a public hearing on the Decision and Application on October 3, 2019;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\tx720 WHEREAS, the Council has considered the land use implications and other policy issues relating to the Decision and Application;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\tx720 WHEREAS, the Council has considered the relevant environmental issues, including the positive declaration\f1 ,\f0  issued on October 28, 2015 (CEQR No. 15DPR013M) and a Final Environmental Impact Statement (\ldblquote FEIS\rdblquote ) for which a Notice of Completion was issued on September 13, 2019, in which t\cf1 he proposed project as analyzed in the FEIS identified the potential for significant adverse impacts with respect to construction (open space, transportation, noise) and urban design and visual resources (views)\f1 .\cf0\f0\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
RESOLVED:\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\tx720 Having considered the FEIS with respect to the Decision and Application, the Council finds that:\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\f1\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\qj\tx720\f0 (1)\tab The FEIS meets the requirements of 6 N.Y.C.R.R. Part 617; \f1\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\tx720\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\qj\tx720\f0 (2)\tab Consistent with social, economic and other essential considerations from among the reasonable alternatives available, the action is one that avoids or minimizes adverse environmental impacts to the maximum extent practicable; and\f1\par
\pard\ltrpar\f2\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\qj\tx720\f0 (3)\tab The adverse environmental impacts identified in the FEIS will be minimized or avoided to the maximum extent practicable by incorporating as conditions to the approval, those project components related to the environment and mitigation measures that were identified as practicable.\f1\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\tx720\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\qj\tx0\tx720\tx1080\f0 The Decision, together with the FEIS constitute the written statement of facts, and of social, economic and other factors and standards that form the basis of this determination, pursuant to 6 N.Y.C.R.R. \'a7617.11(d).\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\tx720 Pursuant to Section 197-d of the City Charter and on the basis of the Decision and Application, and based on the environmental determination and consideration described in this report, C 190357 PQM, incorporated by reference herein, and the record before the Council, the Council approves the Decision.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928\par
Adopted.\par
